headline: PNC Foundation Contributes $2M for New Snow Removal Equipment to City of Pittsburgh
summary: PITTSBURGH, PA / ACCESS Newswire / January 30, 2026 / The PNC Foundation announced it has contributed a $2 million grant to the City of Pittsburgh to purchase new snow removal equipment. "Last weekend's storm was a powerful reminder of how essential ...
